::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod saw yet another missile, and attempted to dodge it.
But the missile followed him, and blasted him back into a tree. His
chest plate was mostly scrap.
"Aaarrrrgg! I'll... get... you... for... this!"
Hot Rod, still sitting on the ground, shoots three plasma blasts at his
attacker.
